edu.msu.cse.dkvf

Class ChannelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.msu.cse.dkvf.ChannelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChannelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class manages the reliable FIFO delivery to servers.

      • ChannelManager

                      int port,
                      int tryAgainWaitTime,
                      int capacity,
                      java.util.logging.Logger logger)
        Constructor for ChannelManager class
        Parameters:
        ip - The IP address of the destination
        port - The port number of the destination
        tryAgainWaitTime - The time before trying again in case of a failed delivery
        capacity - The capacity of pending messages
        logger - The logger
